# HKMetadataKeyFoodType

**Global Variable**

The type of food that the HealthKit object represents.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyFoodType: String
```

## Discussion

This key takes a string value. Food objects are usually [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier/food] samples containing any number of `Nutrition Identifiers` samples.

## Essentials

- **food**: Food correlation types combine any number of nutritional samples into a single food object.
